item.title: Shodan.io
item.description: Tools # Shodan.io Ultratools ASN Search Walkthrough # [Task 2] Getting Started # To solve task 2 read task_1_introduction.md, it is the article that was provided by THM and outlines how to search for ASNs using ultratools then using the ASN:[asn] filter on Shodan.io. First things first. In order to find out google.com’s ip address we can use the ping command. This command just sends a little packet of data to google.
